footerText: © {{year}} The Art of Healing. All rights reserved.
heroTitle: A Sacred Encounter with Ancestral Medicines
heroSubtitle: Discover how Ayahuasca can transform your life, bringing you clarity, emotional healing, and a renewed connection with the universe. Join us in this transformative experience, where tradition meets expert guidance for an unforgettable journey.
contactCommunityText: Follow us on our social media to stay updated with our upcoming events, share experiences, and be part of a community committed to healing and spiritual growth.
whatIsAyahuascaDescription: Ayahuasca is an ancestral sacred brew from the Amazon, composed of two master plants: the Ayahuasca vine (Banisteriopsis caapi) and Chacruna leaves (Psychotria viridis). Together, they create a powerful concoction that opens the doors of spiritual perception, allowing for deep emotional and psychological healing.
howAyahuascaWorksDescription: The experience with Ayahuasca is an introspective journey that can reveal deep patterns of our subconscious, release emotional blockages, and offer a clear vision of our life's purpose. Each ceremony is a unique and personal dialogue with your own being.
spiritualMasterTitle: A Spiritual Master, Not a Drug
spiritualMasterDescription: We honor Ayahuasca as a master plant and a spiritual guide, not as a recreational substance. Our approach is based on deep respect for tradition and a commitment to a safe, controlled, and sacred environment for all participants.
ayahuascaBenefitClarityDescription: It helps to release limiting beliefs and old emotional patterns, bringing a sense of inner peace and clarity.
ayahuascaBenefitHealingDescription: It provides a safe space to confront and heal deep traumas, as well as to break addiction cycles.
ayahuascaBenefitConnectionDescription: It facilitates a deep connection with your inner self, with others, and with the universe, expanding your consciousness.
groupCeremonyDescription: Share the experience in a collective energy circle, where the group's strength enhances individual healing.
privateCeremonyDescription: An intimate and personalized experience, focused on your specific healing process with the dedicated attention of the guides.
guidesPageSubtitle: A team of compassionate and experienced guides, committed to your well-being and transformation. Each one brings their unique wisdom to accompany you on this sacred journey.
addCeremonyDescription: Fill in the details for the new ceremony.
editCeremonyDescription: Make changes to the ceremony details below.
defaultContributionText: You can reserve with a 20% deposit
deleteCeremonyConfirmDescription: This action cannot be undone. This will permanently delete the ceremony.
finishCeremonyConfirmDescription: This will move the ceremony to the 'Past Events' section. This is a permanent action.
inactivateCeremonyConfirmDescription: This will hide the ceremony from public view but it can be reactivated later.
ceremonyMovedToPast: The ceremony is now in 'Past Events'.
errorFinishingCeremony: Could not mark ceremony as finished.
mediaRequiredDescription: Please provide a media URL or upload a file.
deleteGuideConfirmDescription: This will permanently remove the guide. This action cannot be undone.
allCeremoniesSubtitle: Explore all our upcoming and past events. Each one is a unique opportunity for growth and healing.
noUpcomingCeremonies: There are no upcoming ceremonies scheduled at the moment. Check back soon!
exploreMedicineDescription: Learn about Ayahuasca, its origins, benefits, and the sacred process of our ceremonies.
exploreGuidesDescription: Meet the experienced guides who will accompany you on your healing journey with wisdom and care.
preparationCtaDescription: Proper preparation is key to a profound experience. Find all the recommendations here.
preparationProcessDescription: The journey begins weeks before, with a special diet and mental focus to purify body and mind.
ceremonyProcessDescription: A sacred space where, guided by icaros and silence, you connect with the spirit of the medicine.
experienceProcessDescription: A deep introspective journey of emotional release, revelations, and spiritual connection.
integrationProcessDescription: We help you understand and apply the lessons learned to your daily life for lasting transformation.
dietSubtitle: For at least one week before the ceremony, we recommend purifying your body with the following diet:
mentalPrepSubtitle: Your mindset is fundamental. We suggest these practices:
meditationDescription: Practice daily meditation to calm the mind and open your spirit.
intentionsDescription: Reflect on what you wish to heal or understand. What is your purpose for this ceremony?
reflectionDescription: Write down your thoughts and emotions. It's a great tool for self-discovery.
emotionalHealingDescription: The ceremony can bring up intense emotions. It is a process of purification and release. Trust the process, trust the medicine, and trust the guides. We are here to support you in a space of love and unconditional respect. Open your heart to what needs to be seen and healed.
whatToBringTitle: What to Bring to the Ceremony
whatToBringSubtitle: To ensure your comfort and a focused experience, we recommend bringing:
loginSubtext: Enter your credentials to continue your journey.
errorInvalidEmail: Please enter a valid email address.
errorMinLength: {{field}} must be at least {{count}} characters long.
googleSuccessDescription: Welcome! You are now logged in.
registerSubtext: Join our community to access exclusive content.
registerSuccessDescription: We've sent a verification link to your email.
adminPanelSubtitle: Manage your application's content and settings.
profileTabDescription: This information is private and will not be shared.
themeTabDescription: Adjust the color palette for the entire application.
themeUpdateReload: The page will now reload to apply the changes.
userManagementSubtitle: View and manage all registered users.
allUsersDescription: List of all users in the system.
whatsappInviteMessage: Hello! We invite you to fill out our preliminary questionnaire for the Ayahuasca ceremony. Your safety and well-being are our priority. You can fill it out here:
sendEmailDescription: Compose and send an email to all registered users.
emailBodyPlaceholder: Dear community, we'd like to inform you that...
questionnaireDescription: Your safety is our priority. Please answer the following questions honestly. This information is confidential and will only be used to ensure your well-being during the ceremony.
questionnaireCompletedDescription: Thank you for completing the questionnaire. Your information has been saved. You can review your answers below or proceed to the preparation guide.
questionnaireMedicalConditions: Do you have any significant medical conditions (e.g., heart problems, high blood pressure, epilepsy)?
questionnaireMedication: Are you currently taking any medication, especially antidepressants (SSRIs, MAOIs) or medication for psychological conditions?
questionnaireMedicationDetails: If yes, please list all medications:
questionnaireMentalHealth: Do you have a personal or family history of severe mental health conditions (e.g., schizophrenia, bipolar disorder, psychosis)?
questionnaireExperience: Have you had previous experiences with Ayahuasca or other psychedelic substances?
questionnaireExperienceDetails: If yes, please briefly describe your experience:
questionnaireIntention: What is your main intention for participating in this ceremony?
questionnaireIntentionPlaceholder: Describe what you are looking to heal, understand, or explore...
errorRequiredDetails: Please provide details for your 'yes' answer.
questionnaireSuccessDescription: Your questionnaire has been submitted successfully.
questionnaireErrorDescription: There was an error saving your answers. Please try again.
mustBeLoggedIn: You must be logged in to view this page.
dialogSuccessDescription: You have successfully completed the first step. We now invite you to review the preparation guide to get your body and mind ready for this transformative experience.
questionnaireResponsesDescription: Review of the user's submitted health questionnaire.
noAnswersSubmitted: No answers have been submitted by this user yet.
chatHistorySubtitle: Review all conversations with the spiritual guide.
allConversationsDescription: Click on a conversation to view the full chat history.
noConversationsFound: No conversations have been recorded yet.
chatbotWelcome: Greetings, seeker of light. I am the spiritual guide of this sacred space. How may I assist you on your path today? Feel free to ask about Ayahuasca, our ceremonies, or any spiritual concerns you may have.
chatbotError: I'm sorry, I'm having trouble connecting at the moment. Please try again in a moment.
errorCountryCodeRequired: Please select a country code if you provide a phone number.
profileUpdatedError: Failed to update profile. You may need to re-authenticate.
enterPasswordToConfirm: Please enter your current password to confirm this change.
passwordRequired: Password is required for this action.
emailUpdatedSuccessDesc: Your email has been successfully updated.
emailUpdatedError: Error updating email. Please check your password and try again.
passwordUpdatedSuccessDesc: Your password has been changed successfully.
passwordUpdatedError: Error updating password. Please check your current password.
promptRegisterDescription: Create an account to reserve your spot, access exclusive content, and begin your preparation.
errorSelectVideoOrUrl: Please either select a video file or enter a video URL.
editHeroVideoDescription: Replace the main video on the homepage. You can use a URL or upload a new file.
